testcase.name: Login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user input username with "standard_user"...............................passed And user input password with "secret_sauce".................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user will redirect to homepage.........................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user input username with "user_lain"...................................passed And user input password with "coba_coba"....................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then A message appears "Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: Login with empty password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user input username with "standard_user"...............................passed And user input password with "".............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then A message appears "Password is required"...............................passed
